title: Witchbreaker
content:
Witchbreaker Uncommon 2~11 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d10 (1d8)+1 Slashing Witchbreaker: You gain Advantage on Attack Rolls against concentrating creatures. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Thou shalt not suffer a witch to... well, keep doing whatever she's doing. It's probably malefic, involving toads and... and things. Battleaxe Versatile 1.8 170

Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands

1d10 (1d8)+1 Slashing

Witchbreaker: You gain Advantage on A
